thread.title: Market volatility delivers stellar month for trading
thread.title_full: Market volatility delivers stellar month for trading

author: Financial News
title: Market volatility delivers stellar month for trading
text:
Market volatility delivers stellar month for trading By James Rundle 03 September 2015 While the turbulent markets of late August were a cause for concern in some quarters, exchanges on both sides of the Atlantic posted strong trading numbers in what is traditionally viewed as a sleepy month.
